action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-116, by Mr. Neguse.

Provides for consideration of H.R. 4, the Senate amendment to H.R. 3684, and S. Con. Res. 14. Rule makes in order one hour of debate on H.R. 4 and the Senate amendment to H.R. 3684 and allows for a motion to recommit for H.R. 4. Upon passage of the resolution, S. Con. Res. 14 and H. Res. 595, as adopted are amended and H. Res. 594 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 32.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 601, H. Res. 600 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4 (establishing new criteria for the preclearance of, public notification of changes to, and judicial consideration of challenges to voting practices); (2) provides for the consideration of Senate amendments to H.R. 3684 (providing funding for infrastructure projects); (3) provides for the adoption of S.Con.Res. 14 (establishing the congressional budget for FY2022, setting forth budgetary levels for FY2023-FY2031, and providing reconciliation instructions for legislation that increases the deficit); (4) provides for the adoption of H.Res. 595 (committing to concur in Senate amendments to H.R. 3684 by September 28, 2021); and (5) provides for the tabling of H.Res. 594 (providing the rules for consideration of various bills).
